extension.summary: Common caching api for xbmc plugins.

extension.description: This add-on is a basic IRC client for XBMC mediacenter. Internet Relay Chat (IRC) is a protocol for live interactive Internet text messaging (chat) or synchronous conferencing. It is mainly designed for group communication in discussion forums, called channels.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Collection of commonly used addon routines
extension.description: Collection of commonly used addon routines to simplify addon development.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: HTML/XML parser for quick-turnaround applications like screen-scraping
extension.description: Beautiful Soup parses arbitrarily invalid SGML and provides a variety of methods and Pythonic idioms for iterating and searching the parse tree.

extension.summary: Stateful programmatic web browsing in Python, after Andy Lester’s Perl module WWW::Mechanize.
extension.description: packed for xbmc from https://github.com/jjlee/mechanize
extension.disclaimer: packed for xbmc from https://github.com/jjlee/mechanize

extension.summary: Downloads Artwork for TV shows, Movies and Music videos for addons and stores them in a local SQLITE database
extension.description: Queries, stores, and returns metadata for TV shows, Movies and Musicvideos. [CR]Sources:[CR]www.thetvdb.com[CR]www.themoviedb.org[CR]www.imdb.com
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: MySQL Connector/Python is implementing the MySQL Client/Server protocol completely in Python. This means you don't have to compile anything or MySQL (client library) doesn't even have to be installed on the machine.
Generic playback engine that adds bookmarking support to xbmc's player. Code developed by XBMCHUB.com members.
Packed for XBMC from https://github.com/kennethreitz/requests
Requests v2.x packed for XBMC from https://github.com/kennethreitz/requests

extension.summary: Simple, fast, extensible JSON encoder/decoder for Python
extension.description: Simple, fast, extensible JSON encoder/decoder for Python
extension.disclaimer: Code taken from https://pypi.python.org/pypi/simplejson/
extension.license: MIT License, Academic Free License v. 2.1

extension.summary: Collection of commonly used addon routines
extension.description: Collection of commonly used addon routines to simplify addon development.
Collection of common functionality for addons.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, June 2007

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Get Vouchers/Giveaways and Ads
